rprenames.configrenames.notfound:
No configs were found in path "%s".
Configs are creating on pressing "Done" button
on resource pack selection screen. Only featured available.
rprenames.config.title: RPRenames
rprenames.config.createConfigToggle.tool:
Create or not config on closing pack selection screen,
copies checkbox on that screen
rprenames.config.createConfigServerToggl: Create renames config for Server's Resource Pack

Create or not config for Server's Resource Pack
on closing pack selection screen.
rprenames.config.enableAnvilModification: If false, it wont do any modifications of anvil screen.
rprenames.config.showCreateConfigCheckbo:
If true, shows checkbox on pack selection screen
that controls "Create renames config Toggle" option.
rprenames.config.openByDefault.tooltip: If true, opens RP Renames menu automatically.
rprenames.config.slotHighlightColor.tool: Color of highlighted slot that appears on hovering button in Inventory Tab
rprenames.config.slotHighlightALPHA.tool: How opaque the Color of highlighted slot is. In percents [0 - 100]
rprenames.config.recreateConfig.tooltip:
If true, recreates config for renames on exiting
this settings menu depended on enabled resource packs,
 then sets to false
rprenames.config.loadModBuiltinResources:
If true, adds Mod's built-in Resource Packs
to pack selection screen. If false, it will not
show them. Requires restart.
